intro: Arjona, commonly known as *Sida cordifolia*, is a flowering plant native to the Americas. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes cotton and hibiscus. The plant is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in tropical and subtropical regions, often growing in moist, well-drained soils. Arjona is also valued for its medicinal properties in traditional medicine.
